entry.title: Mac中word文件闪退后恢复
entry.content: 关于遇到mac中的word闪退的问题，目前可能是由于兼容性的问题。如果遇到文件无法恢复，根据知乎大神!的帖子可以尝试： ##方案： 打开finder 按cmd+shift+g,打开文件夹路径输入框 输入以下路径，分别查找是否有自己的丢失文件： ~/Library/Containers/com.microsoft.Word/Data/Library/Preferences/AutoRecovery/~/Library/Containers/com.microsoft.Word/Data/Documents 找到之前丢失的文档了，但是点击后发现打不开，提醒文件格式与文件扩展名不符。不要急，将后缀改成.doc 打开文档，按照自己的心意继续编辑或者另存为.docx

entry.title: 实验数据不准确的问题
entry.content: 为什么，实验的数据和想象的差别那么大？ 现在才理解，什么叫：-实验的结果属于别人都信，除了自己不信；-理论的结果属于自己相信，别人都不会信。 发自内心的体会到这句话的内涵。

entry.title: 我的第一篇博客
entry.content: 以上是文章摘要 var options = {"narrow":false,"autoplay":true,"showlrc":3,"mode":"random","music":[{"title":"平凡之路","author":"朴树","url":"http://og9ocpmwk.bkt.clouddn.com/%E5%B9%B3%E5%87%A1%E4%B9%8B%E8%B7%AF.mp3","pic":"https://ogd99kckh.qnssl.com/1.jpg","lrc":"http://og9ocpmwk.bkt.clouddn.com/%E5%B9%B3%E5%87%A1%E4%B9%8B%E8%B7%AF.txt"},{"title":"野子","author":"苏运莹","url":"http://og9ocpmwk.bkt.clouddn.com/01%20%E9%87%8E%E5%AD%90.m4a","pic":"http://og9ocpmwk.bkt.clouddn.com/%E9%87%8E%E5%AD%90.jpg","lrc":"https://ogd99kckh.qnssl.com/%E9%87%8E%E5%AD%90.txt"}]}; options.element = document.getElementById("aplayer-hqDmmStO"); var ap = new APlayer(options); window.aplayers || (window.aplayers = []); window.aplayers.push(ap); 以下是余下全文

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
